title: Senior Project Manager
description:
•	Lead the development team to ensure the assigned duties meets business requirements and the company's objectives
•	Manage changes to the project scope, project schedule, and project costs
•	Successfully manage the relationship with the client
•	Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation
•	Perform risk management to minimize project risks
•	Identify, track, manage and resolve project issues
•	Measure project performance using appropriate tools and techniques
•	Work directly with foreign customers from US, EU, ANZ, ASIA
•	Manage team size of 10~20 members
•	Report to: Division Manager
requirements:
MUST HAVE
•	Good project management skills: estimating, planning, organizing, leading, risk management, decision making
•	Fluent in English (Able to communicate clearly with foreign clients)
•	At least 5 year-experience in PROJECT MANAGER position
•	Have technical knowledge about PHP, .Net, JAVA 
•	Familiar with Agile/ Scrum model
•	Ready for on-site business travel
•	Good communication skills: group discussion leading, team working, etc.
•	Highly responsible, well-organized, communicative, pro-active, dare-to-lead
•	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
•	Experience in outsourcing projects with global large-scale clients is required
